website_summaries.verdict: The D-Link AC5300 Ultra Wi-Fi Router (DIR-895L/R) is a slick-looking, fully loaded tri-band router that delivers some of the fastest scores we've seen in throughput and file-transfer tests.
pros: Excellent 5GHz and Multi-User Multiple Input, Multiple Output (MU-MIMO) throughput

customer_reviews.title: Everybody says its not good or hard to set up but i can assure ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredible router. Everybody says its not good or hard to set up but i can assure you it is very easy and Excelent. The lan speed is very high, 270-280 Mb out of 300 from Virgin, but this also depends on your pc configuration and all that, BUT the wireless is mindblowing. Gone from 120- 150 Mb on Virgin router to 380-390Mb on D-link.(and i am talking about my phone). 4k streaming on pc is flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a difference!
customer_reviews.text: Totally changed how my home works. All devices run better and faster than my old virgin superhub 2. Got this for ps4 pro and xbox one x which need open nat types. Couldn't get that with virgin router. Now gaming has totally changed open nat type all the time. Amazing. Wish I had done this a long time ago......
customer_reviews.author: Gael Drummond

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent router. The setup was fairly easy
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent router. The setup was fairly easy. My Ethernet connection to the broadband port was not very secure. I could not get the cable to click in tight. However it works. All my devices that were struggling with my Virgin Super Hub 2 connect perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: No real improvment
customer_reviews.text: Bought to improve range in a large house replacing Bt hub . We have found no real difference
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kept dropping out out. I returned it for a full refund
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and rock solid performance, don't understand why some users have so much trouble with the router, looks as good as it performs
customer_reviews.author: Robert Baker

customer_reviews.title: Crazy Fast
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to compliment my 1GB fibre optic broadband. I can happily say it did not let me down, very easy to set up (no need to be technical) which I know for me was a selling point. Decent app to monitor while your away from home and great speed.
customer_reviews.author: Nolsie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome router. That is all.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast of a wifi router. It was extremely easy to set up and has great customisability. Multiple bands means there are no issues with lots of devices connecting at once. Fantastic bandwidth and range too. Not sure why the negative reviews here - completely unjustified in my review.
customer_reviews.author: Rockets

customer_reviews.title: Superb Looking Router
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review before I've completed the set up as I feel something needs to be said.... This router looks fantastic! Especially wall mounted. The product dimensions got me concerned initially but once unpacked it doesn't feel nearly as large as it's made out to be. If you want a statement piece, this is the one to get. More to follow when it has been set up and running for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Caius

customer_reviews.title: All Show No go!
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for 24hrs then wifi starred not allowing me to connect. Sent it back got a replacement and then had the same problem with the new one. Not impressed as this is meant to be 200 quid router.
customer_reviews.author: Darren L.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it! What a nightmare. It was ...
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy it! What a nightmare. It was faulty, we spend DAYS trying to make the connection speed get hover than 40mobs. It’s suppsed by capable of over 1700
customer_reviews.author: SJ0nes

customer_reviews.title: It was worse the the much maligned BT infinity 5 modem/router I ...
customer_reviews.text: Whether there was an issue with my router I don't know, but the wireless signal was appalling. It was worse the the much maligned BT infinity 5 modem/router I was replacing.I dont live in some sprawling manor, 2 bedrooms semi detached bungalow! and signal dropped remarkably in sons bedroom. Approx 40 feet from router. Ridiculous. Returned and purchased Asus RT-N56U, wow, amazing, great software and superlative performance. Best of all? 130quid cheaper, and doesn't resemble something off Battlestar Galactica Summing up, the D-Link is a classic example of style over substance.
customer_reviews.author: Adam F.

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: A jack of all trades and a master of none It promises a lot, but it is impossible to configure it the way you want. After 3 months of trying, with the 'help' dlink tech support, I gave up and sent it back. All in all a very frustrating experience.
customer_reviews.author: BillMex

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Dell Studio XPS will not connect to this router.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Rooney

customer_reviews.title: expensive pile of rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Dreadful bit of kit. It drops AC band connections randomly...... The 1st Ac band is even worse.....a number of my devices will not even connect to it. I have an Asus dual band AC router and that has none of the above problems I am rather annoyed that I can no longer return it to Amazon as I seem to have missed the date by 3-4 days/ I guess I will now have to gear up for a fight with Amazon as I am aware that UK laws expects products to be of merchantable quality.
customer_reviews.author: Len Berkshire

product_meta.title: D-Link DIR-890L AC3200 Tri-Band Gigabit Cloud Router
product_meta.description:
Wireless AC3200 Ultra Wi-Fi Router.

BOX CONTAINS


 * 1 x Wireless AC3200 ULTRA Wi-Fi Router
feature_bullets: Wi-Fi performance- AC3200 speed for a ridiculously fast home network
Enhanced AC SmartBeam- Tracks your connected devices for enhanced Wi-Fi speed and range
Tri-Band Wi-Fi- Two 5GHz and one 2.4GHz for maximum possible speed for each device
Smarter bandwidth distributes traffic using band steering technology for optimal Wi-Fi performance
Remote access and management: Manage your network from your smartphone or tablet

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars74 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
